titleStmt.title: Description of University of Pennsylvania Oversize Ms. Codex 373: Italian historical miscellany

msIdentifier.repository: Kislak Center for Special Collections, Rare Books and Manuscripts

msItem.title: Historia dei re di Portugallo raccolta in breve compendio, f. 1r
Relatione di tutta la Provincia di Dalmatia, f. 17r
Copia della lettera che scrisse...al sermo doge di Venetia with Reposta della serma Signoria di Venetia, f. 109r
Discorso sopre le cose turcheschei, f. 147r
Informatione del successo di queste armate, f. 152r
Scrittura all?illmo. Marc Antonio Colonna, f. 156r

supportDesc.extent: 196 leaves : 273 x 213 (215 x 170) mm. bound to 272 x 217 mm
supportDesc.foliation: Paper, 196; [1-196]; modern foliation in pencil, upper right recto (f. 58, 106-108, 112, 161, 181, 190 and 195 blank).

scriptDesc.scriptNote: Written in a variety of cursive scripts by several hands on different papers.

binding.p: Contemporary limp vellum. Fragile, moderate to severe oxidation of ink in some sections, minor worm damage.

origin.p: Written in Italy in the second half of the 16th century (Zacour-Hirsch).

keywords.term: Catholic Church--Foreign relations--Holy Roman Empire--Charles V, 1519-1556
